General.Name: Global View Co Ltd
General.Description: Global View Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic dictionaries in Taiwan and Mainland China. It offers electronic dictionary products under the Wenquxing and Harbin brand names. The company also engages in property leasing activity. Global View Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 287, Wenhua Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 220503
